summary: “Best part of phil?” “His penis”
question: “Best part of phil?” “His penis”
answer:
Sometimes Dan loved his mouth. His quick wit often had his friends in hysterics and his enemies in tears. He wore it like a badge of honor.

Today was not one of those days.

He and Phil’s relationship was almost ten years old, and the most poorly kept secret on the internet. But it was still a secret. Playing stupid games with other YouTubers at vidcon parties was always a little dangerous, especially when alcohol was involved. It was supposed to be some kind of group bonding exercise or whatever, Dan wasn’t really sure, but the game was pretty simple; you were asked a question and had to answer with the first thing that came to your head. There had been a fair mix of questions and answers so far, but Dan’s stomach was warm with drinks and Phil’s presence at his side distracting. So he really didn’t think before he answered this time.

Tyler smirked at him from across the circle, “Dan?” Dan looked at him, raising a brow. 

“Best part of Phil?”

“His penis.” 

The moment the words left his mouth he realised his mistake, eyes going comically wide as the group of at least twenty content creators gaped at him. Then a few started giggling, and Dan’s eyes flickered to the side to meet those of a shocked and embarrassed looking Phil. 

However by the time they both faced the group again they’d moved on, questioning poor Joe instead. Dan was confused, “Isn’t anyone going to ask?” He found himself saying, despite the dirty look from Phil. Louise chuckled, “Why?”

“Because…you know?”

Louise patted his back, “Honey, we’ve known for years.” 

Tyler spoke over them, “So Phil, what’s your favorite part of Dan?” Phil paused for longer than was technically allowed. Then a smirk crept over his face.

“His mouth.”

summary: Fun fact: the toddler I take care of, who is turning 2 next week, is extremely energetic and is constantly running everywhere....
body: Fun fact: the toddler I take care of, who is turning 2 next week, is extremely energetic and is constantly running everywhere. But when I put on a phil video (only amazingphil videos not dnp games or Dan’s videos ) she just sits and watches the video and gets upset when an ad comes up. She laughs at some parts which i think is so precious!! So thank you @amazingphil for making babysitting more bearable 💖💖 we are currently having a pinof marathon right now lol

summary: in the darkness, with you - chapter 4: resignation
title: in the darkness, with you - chapter 4: resignation
body:
Read from the start: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36415200

Read chapter 4: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36701103

The majority of this is pre-written and will be posted regularly!

THANK YOU to my amazing beta @insectbah  ❤️

Summary:
Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

Excerpt from chapter 4:
Not many words are exchanged between the two of them, not for long, not until Dan breathes right in his ear, “Don’t stop.”
Phil doesn’t. He cannot. Not just in this situation.

summary: Yeah. Rock beats scissors. Phil win fair and square, they just seem to do this so often that it's hard to see. They do it so...
question: Yeah. Rock beats scissors. Phil win fair and square, they just seem to do this so often that it's hard to see. They do it so fast because they're probably used to it.
answer: jfc i commented on this (x) but like i legitimately had to rewatch it like four times just to see what exactly they played? they must literally play this all the time damn, to see that quickly who won? i’m soft for it honestly

summary: Dnp is still trending on tumblr and bumped from 5th most popular tag to 4th and it goes to show that we all collectively...
question: Dnp is still trending on tumblr and bumped from 5th most popular tag to 4th and it goes to show that we all collectively wondered if we hallucinated and then blew up tumblr about that video
answer:
a fricken mood we just did not know how to cope? i posted nearly 50 posts yesterday/this morning and made 12 different clips and i’m still not over it.

hallucination confirmed ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

tags: cause im so aick of seeing those posts
summary: I hope y’all know that a dom/sub relationship is not the only relationship that exists. Some posts I see on here are kind of...
body:
I hope y’all know that a dom/sub relationship is not the only relationship that exists. Some posts I see on here are kind of frightening, especially when I go to their page and see the person who wrote the post is 14-18 years old. While I know some of the posts are jokes, some seem very serious and make it seem as though someone HAS to be submissive and someone HAS to be dominant in a relationship. For other kids and teens out there that only look to tumblr for what a relationship should be, please stop now! And please, everyone else, stop making it seem like every relationship has a dom and a sub.

Also: PLEASE stop acting like anytime someone says “shhh” or “calm down” and the other person does it means they’re in a dom/sub relationship.

Also: PLEASE stop acting like anytime someone says “shhh” or “calm down” and the other person does it means they’re in a dom/sub relationship.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: Bodyswap Masterlist
title: Bodyswap Masterlist
body:
Body Swap (ao3) - HelloAnonymousWriter

Summary: Dan’s cousin comes over and after a freaky trip to the museum they wake up in each other’s bodies. The problem is keeping it from Phil and finding out if he likes Dan the way Dan loves him.

Changes (Just Gonna Have To Be A Different Man) - transcendentalphan

Summary: One day in August for some unknown reason, Dan and Phil wake up in each other’s bodies.

Do You Believe In Magic? - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil live in a world where magic exists. They’ve grown up together in a same small town and have learned to hate each other. One day a ‘witch’ casts a spell on them to make them switch bodies with each other. They spell can’t be undone until they learn to get along.

Freaky ‘Phriday’ (ao3) - itsnotyuki

Summary: Dan’s parents have gone to India for Christmas and Dan is feeling alone. Phil invites Dan to have Christmas dinner with his family, but Dan refuses and wants to be alone. After the argument, Phil makes a Japanese potion to switch bodies with Dan - without telling him - so that Dan will be forced to attend Phil’s family Christmas dinner (in Phil’s body) in order to not disappoint Phil’s family. Meanwhile, Phil (in Dan’s body) stays behind in the flat and gets a surprise ready for Dan.

It Went Like This - full-dark-no-starss

Summary: So really, it all started when our form tutor who-is-possessed-by-a-god-knows-what started talking to us. Or did it start when I woke up in Dan Howell’s body?

Reflections of the Heart - butterflyphil

Summary: “Being told to dress up in a dinosaur onesie and have cereal catapulted at your face is a little odd. Waking up to find that you and your best friend have switched bodies? That’s fucking bizarre.”

Reinvent Love (ao3) - stylinshaw

Summary: His soulmate’s room also has a hideous color scheme, Dan notices.Hideous, but familiar. (au where you swap bodies with your soulmate once the younger turns 18. also, dan is an amazingphil fanboy)

Swapped - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Soulmates AU where you switch places with your soulmate on your eighteenth birthday and you switch back once you meet each other.

Switched - littlelioncats

Summary: What if Dan & Phil sort of had a freaky Friday moment and ended up switching bodies.

The Swap (wattpad) - Icringeatmyownfics

Summary: Dan and Phil wake up to find something is different.

Willow Falls Fic - rainbowroshenpower

Summary: Dan wants to move and Phil doesn’t. There’s also a body swap and they live in a town called Willows Falls.

You’re Not Yourself (ao3) - mollieblack

Summary: Dan and Phil get into a fight and go off to their rooms to cool down. They’d been planning on rewatching Freaky Friday together, and both of them had the idea to get back at the other by watching it without them.

They go to bed angry, and when they wake up something seems to have changed…
